entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer focused on building intelligent, scalable solutions. This work, including Harmony Marketing Hub, is built on FOSS principles.

projects.name: Harmony Marketing Hub
projects.description: An AI-powered FOSS platform for marketing automation and data-driven campaigns. It streamlines omni-channel marketing efforts, making advanced growth tools accessible to startups and SMBs.

channels.description: Support our collection of FOSS projects through our Open Collective page. All funds are publicly accounted for and directly support project growth and maintenance.

plans.name: General Harmony Support
plans.description: A recurring contribution to cover essential operational costs like server hosting and core maintenance specifically for the Harmony Marketing Hub.

plans.name: AI Model Development Grant
plans.description: A strategic one-time grant to accelerate development of new AI models for intelligent lead scoring and advanced customer segmentation features.
